basic.description: This course explores common methods of data assimilation, such as Kalman filtering, ensemble filter, particle and hybrid filters, along with variational methods. These methods are introduced and derived in the context of bothvariational and estimation theory with emphasis on computational aspects,  using simple models and current research materials.
basic.subject: ISC
basic.title: Computational Aspects of Data Assimilation

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 2311, MAC 2312, MAS 3105, ISC 5305, or instructor permission.
